typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		policy as string,
		policy_id as string,
		{Primary Key} as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Autogenerated as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		policy as string,
		update_date as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(input(
		policy as string,
		policy_id as string,
		{Primary Key} as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Autogenerated as string,
		active_status as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		{ABirami Bala subramani10} as string,
		{ABirami Bala subramani11} as string,
		LogeshBalasubramani as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	quoteAll: true) ~> sink1
